}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== <small>This dongle would appear to come bundled with the [[BT Home Hub 5]].</small>
Two USB IDs are specified as ac devices within the ''BT'''s :''Broadcom'' driver set (dated 11/16/2012, v 6.30.145.9).. *0a5c:bd1d - presumably the default BCM43526 USB ID *0a5c:43a2
[[Category:English Documentation]]
